commit message:
Support a wider range of file and image browsers

The Gallery returns a 'content' scheme URI, but many other apps return
either a 'file' or a 'dat' scheme. For non-'content' schemes we now use
the ContentResolver to give us a data stream, which we copy to out cover
image file.

Code cleanups

Add comments to saveUrlToFile and call saveInputToFile internally

Simplification to task message handling and fix buf on search handling

When searching for a book via name/title, a failure in amazon would
result in search terminating due to timing of messages. Now there is
only one message...
Fixed button positions in a few more dialogs and code cleanup
